titles.title: Access to Inpatient Rehabilitation Therapy Act of 2015

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include recreational therapy among the therapy modalities that constitute an intensive rehabilitation therapy program in an inpatient rehabilitation hospital or unit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/21/2015--Introduced. Access to Inpatient Rehabilitation Therapy Act of 2015
Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to include recreational therapy services among the therapeutic modalities that constitute an intensive rehabilitation therapy program in determining whether inpatient services in an inpatient rehabilitation facility are reasonable and necessary.
